alert.note: Alert for Fulton; Kosciusko; Marshall; Miami; Pulaski (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Pulaski, Fulton, southern Kosciusko, northwestern Miami and southeastern Marshall Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 530 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Argos to near Royal Center. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Mentone around 550 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Winona Lake, Warsaw and Pierceton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central and northwestern Indiana. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central and northeastern Indiana.
